snippet: The assault is part of a broader operation to disrupt the ability of the Islamic State to generate revenue to support its military operations.
abstract: American airstrikes destroy 116 Islamic State oil-smuggling trucks in eastern Syria in bid to cripple group's revenues; operation was planned before Paris terrorist attacks and included dropping of leaflets to warn civilians.
lead_paragraph: The assault is part of a broader operation to disrupt the ability of the Islamic State to generate revenue to support its military operations.

headline.main: U.S. Warplanes Strike ISIS Oil Trucks in Syria
headline.print_headline: U.S. Airstrikes Destroy Scores of ISIS Oil Trucks in Syria
